ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Digest Number 556
ygData.msgSnippet: You....were able to quit? How d you do it, a 12 step program right! Wait no, you went to EQA! Or maybe you had a sponsor that you had to call when you were
ygData.messageBody:
You....were able to quit?
How'd you do it, a 12 step program right! Wait no, you went to EQA! Or
maybe you had a sponsor that you had to call when you were feeling weak?
Oh I hope you didn't have to go to the Betty Kobold clinic, I hear the
DT's are nasty!
Please tell us, we need help!

Ha ha, j/k! I'll be on tonight, I'll see if they are around. Can't
guarantee I'll find them but I'll look just the same. ;-)

-----Original Message-----
Message: 1
Date: Thu, 08 Aug 2002 02:17:06 -0000
From: "bradleysemailaddress" <bradleysemailaddress@...>
Subject: Howdy, anybody on Tribunal?

Howdy, I used to be a huge EQ addict, but about a year ago I just
stopped playing. Since then I've lost contact with all my friends
that made the game fun for me. If somebody could check to see if they
are still around get if so get them to email me at
bradleysmailaddress@.... I was a 59 ogre sk named Protectorof,
my friends were named, Tval, Durtier, Dotts, and Hokyun. I would
greatly appreciate somebody taking the time to help me out.
